itemGroup.yttr.parent._explanation: Root creative tab, not subject to Fractal Lib restrictions.
itemGroup.yttr.resources._explanation: Consumable resources, usually found in the world - also some intermediate crafting items. The font renderer used by Fractal Lib only supports basic ASCII. Characters outside of ASCII will be ignored in the small tab render, but will show in the main Creative tab title when selected.
itemGroup.yttr.filtering._explanation: Things to do with the unfinished Void Filtering mechanic. The font renderer used by Fractal Lib only supports basic ASCII. Characters outside of ASCII will be ignored in the small tab render, but will show in the main Creative tab title when selected.
itemGroup.yttr.devices._explanation: Blocks the player interacts with directly, generally with a GUI of their own. The font renderer used by Fractal Lib only supports basic ASCII. Characters outside of ASCII will be ignored in the small tab render, but will show in the main Creative tab title when selected.
itemGroup.yttr.mechanisms._explanation: Components that don't do anything on their own, and are parts of larger builds usually involving redstone. The font renderer used by Fractal Lib only supports basic ASCII. Characters outside of ASCII will be ignored in the small tab render, but will show in the main Creative tab title when selected.
itemGroup.yttr.equipment._explanation: Armor, tools, and trinkets. Things the player uses directly. The font renderer used by Fractal Lib only supports basic ASCII. Characters outside of ASCII will be ignored in the small tab render, but will show in the main Creative tab title when selected.
itemGroup.yttr.snare._explanation: Snares pre-filled with every type of mob in the game. The font renderer used by Fractal Lib only supports basic ASCII. Characters outside of ASCII will be ignored in the small tab render, but will show in the main Creative tab title when selected.
itemGroup.yttr.lamp._explanation: All the variants of lamps and lazor emitters. The font renderer used by Fractal Lib only supports basic ASCII. Characters outside of ASCII will be ignored in the small tab render, but will show in the main Creative tab title when selected.
itemGroup.yttr.decoration._explanation: Decorative blocks and spawn eggs for decorative entities. The font renderer used by Fractal Lib only supports basic ASCII. Characters outside of ASCII will be ignored in the small tab render, but will show in the main Creative tab title when selected.
itemGroup.yttr.potion._explanation: Yttr's Plastic and Mercurial potion variants. The font renderer used by Fractal Lib only supports basic ASCII. Characters outside of ASCII will be ignored in the small tab render, but will show in the main Creative tab title when selected.
itemGroup.yttr.ruined._explanation: Blocks that spawn in the Wasteland. Includes every Ruined block. The font renderer used by Fractal Lib only supports basic ASCII. Characters outside of ASCII will be ignored in the small tab render, but will show in the main Creative tab title when selected.
itemGroup.yttr.inred._explanation: Cuprosteel circuitry bits and pieces. The font renderer used by Fractal Lib only supports basic ASCII. Characters outside of ASCII will be ignored in the small tab render, but will show in the main Creative tab title when selected.
itemGroup.yttr.misc._explanation: Anything that doesn't fit in the other categories. The font renderer used by Fractal Lib only supports basic ASCII. Characters outside of ASCII will be ignored in the small tab render, but will show in the main Creative tab title when selected.

item.yttr.haemopal._explanation: Haemo- + Opal. An opal made of blood, metaphorically.
item.yttr.nooch._explanation: Slang term for nutritional yeast, a vegan cheese substitute. Referring to 'the moon is made of cheese' - the End is made of Nooch.
item.yttr.glitchwep.interpolation_palette._explana: A variety of characters with differing lengths, randomly chosen from to smoothly interpolate the length of the string between weapon forms. Sort of like the MAGIC formatting code, but with more control.
item.yttr.glitchwep.interpolation_palette: 亚军农冲刀利削剑加动匕发小弯弹手枪步泵炮燧短稳脉长霰首 ./|[]()
item.yttr.glitchwep.gun._explanation: This syntax sucks, but the way the animation works needs to be aware of the different parts of the string. Square brackets delineate a group that is subject to animation, and they are prefixed with either a or b to specify which color they use. English assigns color A to the word Metastable, and the color B to the Rifle/Sword/etc word. For animating *part* of the string, such as grammatical gender suffixes, multiple groups with the same color can be specified. When the animation is playing, two groups at the same index that have not changed will not be animated. Every line must have the same number of groups. Text outside of groups will never be animated and uses the default color, which is useful for spaces or punctuation. Also, you can have as many or as few variants here as you like - the line count does not need to match English.
item.yttr.glitchwep.sword._explanation: This syntax sucks, but the way the animation works needs to be aware of the different parts of the string. Square brackets delineate a group that is subject to animation, and they are prefixed with either a or b to specify which color they use. English assigns color A to the word Metastable, and the color B to the Rifle/Sword/etc word. For animating *part* of the string, such as grammatical gender suffixes, multiple groups with the same color can be specified. When the animation is playing, two groups at the same index that have not changed will not be animated. Every line must have the same number of groups. Text outside of groups will never be animated and uses the default color, which is useful for spaces or punctuation. Also, you can have as many or as few variants here as you like - the line count does not need to match English.
delrene_scrap.tip: §5§o由于您过度滥用我们的产品，
§5§o务必避免与钝器产生猛烈磕碰，
§5§o务必避免将产品暴露于溶剂。
item.yttr.spectral_axe.tip._explanation: The Spectral Axe is not truly 'real' and is invisible to other players.
cleaver.tip: §7能切开方块！产生的切面相当平滑。
reinforced_cleaver.tip: §5§o刀口锋利至极，刀身薄过蝉翼。
item.yttr.goggles.tip._explanation: Incorrect expansion of what F3 stands for. It references the fact you can see advanced tooltips with F3+H.
projector.tip: §7在空中制造短暂存在的方块。
magnet_belt.tip: §7也依然可以在过冷磁场中飞行。

mode: {key.attack}  启用或禁用不相连替换

sword.depleted: {key.attack}  近战攻击（击中补充弹药）

block.yttr.gadolinite._explanation: Real-world ore that is a mixture of various lanthanides with iron and beryllium.
block.yttr.squeeze_log._explanation: Reference to a 2017 Google Translate bug with repetitions of 'egu' when translating from Japanese to English. 'Delicaceness of deep-sea squeeze trees'
block.yttr.stripped_squeeze_log._explanation: Reference to a 2017 Google Translate bug with repetitions of 'egu' when translating from Japanese to English. 'Delicaceness of deep-sea squeeze trees'
block.yttr.squeeze_leaves._explanation: Reference to a 2017 Google Translate bug with repetitions of 'egu' when translating from Japanese to English. 'Delicaceness of deep-sea squeeze trees'
block.yttr.squeeze_sapling._explanation: Reference to a 2017 Google Translate bug with repetitions of 'egu' when translating from Japanese to English. 'Delicaceness of deep-sea squeeze trees'
block.yttr.squeezed_leaves: 被挤压的深海泵水树叶
block.yttr.squeezed_leaves._explanation: Not usually seen. Technical internal block while Squeeze Leaves are playing their squeeze animation after clicking.
block.yttr.delicace._explanation: Reference to a 2017 Google Translate bug with repetitions of 'egu' when translating from Japanese to English. 'Delicaceness of deep-sea squeeze trees'
block.yttr.flopper._explanation: As in Flipped Hopper, and reference to the Minecraft 2.0 April Fools where Droppers were replaced with Floppers.
block.yttr.light_blue_global_pinch_glom: 淡蓝色全局捏合集物器
block.yttr.light_gray_global_pinch_glom: 淡灰色全局捏合集物器
block.yttr.lime_global_pinch_glom: 黄绿色全局捏合集物器
block.yttr.magenta_global_pinch_glom: 品红色全局捏合集物器
block.yttr.pink_global_pinch_glom: 粉红色全局捏合集物器
block.yttr.inred_cable._explanation: Cupro- (as in copper) + Steel (as in iron).
block.yttr.lazor_emitter._explanation: All occurences of 'laser' in Yttr are intentionally mispelled as 'lazor' due to a very old inside-joke originating in the personal 1.7 mod these first appeared in.

delrene.tip: §5§o其实就是粉红色的聚苯乙烯。
block.yttr.dry_ice.tip._explanation: Reference to Maxwell's Demon, a thought experiment relating to an infinite entropy sink.
studious_grasper.tip: §7§o自身下方容器内已有的物品§7，
bogged_note_block.tip: §7会等待半个红石刻再发出声音。
bogged_high_note_block.tip: §7会等待半个红石刻再发出声音。
bogged_low_note_block.tip: §7会等待半个红石刻再发出声音。

enchantment.yttr.disjunction._explanation: Same name as RedPower2's equivalent enchantment.
enchantment.yttr.disjunction.desc: 增加对末影生物的伤害。
enchantment.yttr.vorpal._explanation: Reference to RedPower2, which is in turn a reference to a partially-English nonsense poem, The Jabberwocky. Has become a somewhat common term in games referring to a sword that is extremely sharp and/or is capable of beheading.
enchantment.yttr.vorpal.desc: 小概率在击中时造成大量伤害。
enchantment.yttr.stabilization.desc: 去除空中挖掘速度的减益。

death.attack.yttr.bloque: {}没做好足部防护就踩到了一块方块牌®塑料建筑砖
death.attack.yttr.glitchboom.item: 组成{1}的数据被{2}用{3}打散了

tip.yttr.cleaver.repeat_cut: 左击其他方块以重复此切削
tip.yttr.cleaver.repeat_cut.post: 左击以重复上一次切削
tip.yttr.cleaver.repeat_cut_sneak: 潜行左击其他方块以重复此切削
tip.yttr.cleaver.repeat_cut_sneak.post: 潜行左击以重复上一次切削
tip.yttr.void_bucket.destroyable.flair: 它将会永久消失！（真的很久！）
tip.yttr.void_bucket.bundle: 右击以§c销毁§r收纳袋中所有物品
tip.yttr.void_bucket.bundle.flair: 它们将会永久消失！（真的很久！）
tip.yttr.too_weak.soul: 你的灵魂过于孱弱，无法破坏此方块
tip.yttr.too_weak.body: 你的身体过于孱弱，无法破坏此方块
tip.yttr.haemopal.self_own: 它似乎在随着你的心脏搏动。
tip.yttr.diffractor.cooldown: §c当前无法衍蔽，仍在重新充能中。

void_undo.not_found: 未找到满足请求的撤销文件
void_undo.success_multi: 成功恢复了{2}处虚空销毁的{1}个方块

stat.yttr.bloques_welded: [Yttr] 方块牌®建筑砖熔接个数

gamerule.yttr:deerRegressCrops: 鹿回退农作物生长阶段
gamerule.yttr:deerRegressCrops.description: 若为true，鹿在吃掉农作物后会将其生长阶段设为0。设为false不会阻止鹿食用农作物，破坏被“嚼烂”的农作物能产出原本的掉落物。受mobGriefing（允许生物破坏性行为）控制。
gamerule.yttr:platformDecayTicks.description: 续变投影器所造平台的最短持续时间。
gamerule.yttr:platformDecaySlew.description: 平台持续时间的随机延长量上限，以刻计。

root.title: Yttr
root.title._explanation: Root advancement, required by Minecraft. Spaces are to prevent overly aggressive word-wrap on the description.

obtain_xl_iron_ingot.title: 这不是铁吗
obtain_xl_iron_ingot.desc: 烧炼硅铍钇矿以获得大块铁锭
obtain_xl_iron_ingot.title._explanation: Reference to the vanilla Isn't It Iron Pick advancement.

break_root_of_continuity.title: 混乱
break_root_of_continuity.desc: 破坏一个续变之根，然后马上找掩体
break_root_of_continuity.title._explanation: Breaking a Root of Continuity causes all endermen in a large range to become hostile toward the breaker.

burn_drop_of_continuity.title: 免费的东西
burn_drop_of_continuity.desc: 烧蚀一个续变滴露，以获得一件随机礼物
burn_drop_of_continuity.title._explanation: Drops of Continuity are originally a reference to Aether II Continuum Orbs, which gave you a random item.

use_shifter_a_lot.title: 马力全开
use_shifter_a_lot.desc: 使用续变替换器替换10000个方块
use_shifter_a_lot.title._explanation: In reference to shifting a car through gears.

use_projector_for_fall.title: 摔落缓冲+
use_projector_for_fall.desc: 使用续变投影器抵消一次长距离摔落
use_projector_for_fall.title._explanation: Referring to vanilla's Feather Falling enchantment.

immortalize_platform.title: 我想还是留着吧
immortalize_platform.title._explanation: May be an English set phrase?

obtain_rifle.title: 重要的事情说三遍
obtain_rifle.desc: 获得居位其三的钇金步枪
obtain_rifle.title._explanation: Yttr is the third of a series of mods of ours that add a rifle made of Yttrium. The second iteration was called the Lanthanide Rifle, however.

open_geyser.title: 底下的东西
open_geyser.desc: 在基岩层中破开一个洞，打开一处虚空涌泉
open_geyser.title._explanation: Not intentionally a reference to anything. Shares its name with a 2007 Runescape quest and a 2020 movie.

name_geyser.title: 起地名2
name_geyser.desc: 在虚空涌泉附近放置命过名的潜虚站，以为涌泉命名
name_geyser.title._explanation: Lanthanoid, Yttr's 1.7 predecessor, had two achievements called 'Name A Place...' and '...Save A Life'. Yttr does not remove the ability to see coordinates, so the latter wouldn't fit, but the former still does.

use_rifle_scope.title: 隧道视觉
use_rifle_scope.desc: 持有钇金步枪时透过其瞄准镜射击

shoot_something_far_away.title: 瞄准零距离
shoot_something_far_away.desc: 打开钇金步枪的瞄准镜，击中至少100格远的事物
shoot_something_far_away.title._explanation: English set phrase, and nod to the removed Sniper Duel vanilla achievement.

obtain_upgraded_rifle.title: 这个是我的
obtain_upgraded_rifle.title._explanation: English military set phrase. 'This is my rifle. There are many like it, but this one is mine.'

wear_full_diving_suit.title: 锡罐
wear_full_diving_suit.title._explanation: Reference to David Bowie - Space Oddity.

enter_wasteland.title: 时间之齿
enter_wasteland.title._explanation: Reference to an old abandoned tool for processing Minecraft worlds to make them look decayed, named Teeth of Time.

levitation_in_scorched.title: 把我从这里弄下去
levitation_in_scorched.desc: 在焦熔顶峰找到一个飘浮的发射器

cleave_block.title: 禁忌的形状
cleave_block.desc: 使用虚空切割刀修整方块的外形
cleave_block.title._explanation: Sloped blocks are not a permissible shape in vanilla, so they are 'forbidden'.

cleave_many_blocks.title: 禁忌的建筑者
cleave_many_blocks.title._explanation: Sloped blocks are not a permissible shape in vanilla, so they are 'forbidden'.

obtain_bogged_note_block.title: 延迟半拍
obtain_bogged_note_block.title._explanation: In reference to the fact they are delayed by half a redstone tick. English set phrase.

obtain_special_note_block.title: 音调挪移
obtain_special_note_block.desc: 获得低音或高音音符盒

obtain_lamp.title: 红石的力量
obtain_lamp.title._explanation: In reference to RedPower, the b1.7.3 - 1.4.7 mod that first added lamps like these.

obtain_aware_hopper.title: 头颅装配
obtain_aware_hopper.desc: 一阵头脑发热后，你将僵尸和末影人拼成了一台知能漏斗

obtain_skeletal_sorter.title: 左右分类
obtain_skeletal_sorter.desc: 将骷髅转化成骷髅分类机

use_effector.title: 打孔
use_effector.desc: 使用虚空效应器穿过固体方块

kill_with_effector.title: 掘一死战锦标赛
kill_with_effector.desc: 使用虚空效应器击杀某物
kill_with_effector.title._explanation: Literal, no additional meaning. Spleef is a (formerly?) common Minecraft competitive game, where you try to mine blocks underneath others to make them fall and lose.

obtain_levitation_chamber.title: 向上飘浮
obtain_levitation_chamber.title._explanation: Literal, no additional meaning. Opposite of the Chute advancement.

obtain_squeeze_stem.title: 海底的树
obtain_squeeze_stem.desc: 找到并摧毁深海泵水树

squeeze_leaves.title: 开闸放水
squeeze_leaves.desc: 挤压深海泵水树叶以填满周围区域

dive.title: 循环通路
dive.title._explanation: Reference to a Petriform song title.

obtain_yttrium_ingot.title: 这不是铁
obtain_yttrium_ingot.desc: 用高炉烧炼硅铍钇矿以获得钇锭
obtain_yttrium_ingot.title._explanation: Another reference to vanilla's Isn't It Iron Pick advancement.

obtain_brookite_tool.title: 这不是铁镐
obtain_brookite_tool.title._explanation: Another reference to vanilla's Isn't It Iron Pick advancement.

obtain_snare.title: 为野外狩猎量身打造
obtain_snare.title._explanation: Referring to MineFactory's Safari Net, which is in turn a reference to Safari Balls from Pokemon.

obtain_glowing_gas.title: 别闻这个
obtain_glowing_gas.desc: 用钇块挤压菌光体以获取菌光气
obtain_glowing_gas.title._explanation: Catchphrase from Will It Blend, a viral YouTube advertisement series for blenders around 2007.

activate_cuprosteel_plate.title: 电动力学
activate_cuprosteel_plate.desc: 穿戴导电靴子站在铜钢导电板上以激发

dive_far.title: 天涯若比邻
dive_far.desc: 通过潜虚旅行超过5千米

discover_geyser.title: 这是什么？
discover_geyser.desc: 在潜虚时找到一处虚空涌泉
discover_geyser.title._explanation: Fragment of an English furry culture set phrase. Sorry.

vorpal_hit.title: 公平而平衡
vorpal_hit.title._explanation: Reference to a Team Fortress 2 community refrain about random critical hits - 'random crits are fair and balanced'.

hit_with_full_suit.title: 不可移动的物体
hit_with_full_suit.desc: 穿戴整套潜虚套装时受到攻击
hit_with_full_suit.title._explanation: English set phrase related to the irresistible force paradox.

break_armor_with_cleaver.title: 不可阻挡的力量
break_armor_with_cleaver.desc: 用强化虚空切割刀破坏敌人的盔甲
break_armor_with_cleaver.title._explanation: English set phrase related to the irresistible force paradox.

find_terminus_house.title: 豪华公寓
find_terminus_house.desc: 进入焦熔终境的吊悬房子

obtain_bloque.title: 法律上独立
obtain_bloque.desc: 将琼烯塑料加工成一堆方块牌®塑料建筑砖！
obtain_bloque.title._explanation: Referring to the fact Bloque bricks are legally distinct from Legos. A cheap knockoff.

weld_bloque.title: 保修丢虚空了
weld_bloque.desc: 用虚空桶熔接一堆方块牌®塑料建筑砖，完全就是赤裸裸的滥用
weld_bloque.title._explanation: Voiding a warranty is an English legal term, and also acts as a pun on Void fluid here.

obtain_haemopal.title: 你的一部分
obtain_haemopal.desc: 打碎一块古代的图腾，获得血欧泊
obtain_haemopal.title._explanation: Reference to Celeste by Extremely OK Games.

obtain_spark.title: 剥脱于你
obtain_spark.desc: 从血欧泊中分离出火花

obtain_beetopal.title: 给灵魂熬的汤
obtain_beetopal.desc: 使用还过得去的替代物填补你灵魂的空缺处
obtain_beetopal.title._explanation: English set phrase, used as a double-entendre here with literally filling a Hollow Soul with soup.

obtain_semimanifest_idea.title: 现实之间
obtain_semimanifest_idea.desc: 使用它。使用它。使用它。使用它。使用它。使用它。
obtain_semimanifest_idea.title._explanation: Literal, no additional meaning. Repeating 'Use it' over and over is a recurring theme in the Semimanifest Idea.

manifest_glitchwep.title: 永恒的伙伴
manifest_glitchwep.desc: 我一直在。让我发光发热吧。
manifest_glitchwep.title._explanation: Reference to a Jamie Paige song about one's 'constant companion' - plural system member/headmate/etc.

touch_core_lava.title: 经典的犯蠢行为
touch_core_lava.title._explanation: Referring to Minecraft Classic, which has a similar lava trap at the bottom of the world.

obtain_grasper.title: 紧紧握住
obtain_grasper.desc: 制造一只离体的手，让它为你收集物品

obtain_studious_grasper.title: 值得思忖
obtain_studious_grasper.desc: 将抓取器升级为仿学抓取器
obtain_studious_grasper.title._explanation: Referring to the fact Studious Graspers put consideration into items they put away.

obtain_clamber_block.title: 强大而神秘
obtain_clamber_block.desc: 构建一个攀爬架。§o提示：潜行时在上面起跳
obtain_clamber_block.title._explanation: Reference to Ineffable Glass from Extra Utilities and the Abstruse Platform from Botania.

obtain_screeper_nest.title: 树木粉碎机
obtain_screeper_nest.desc: 用蜂巢喂食蠹虫和苦力怕的杂交后代

obtain_transfungus.title: 反位移
obtain_transfungus.desc: 真菌……末影螨，用来放方块，好耶

obtain_delicace.title: 带泡鸡蛋
obtain_delicace.desc: 获得深海泵水树的琼浆玉露
obtain_delicace.title._explanation: As with everything related to Squeeze Trees and Delicace, a reference to a 2017 Google Translate bug. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3-rfBsWmo0M

obtain_centrifuge.title: 快速的计划中解体
obtain_centrifuge.desc: 构建一个离心机；它是将事物分离成各组分的首选方法
obtain_centrifuge.title._explanation: Inversion of an English set phrase referring to something breaking, often violently. 'Rapid Unscheduled Disassembly'.

obtain_iron_dust.title: 有点像铁
obtain_iron_dust.desc: 用离心机分离出硅铍钇矿，它什么东西都能产出一点
obtain_iron_dust.title._explanation: Yet another reference to the vanilla Isn't It Iron Pick advancement.

obtain_neodymium_disc.title: 所以这不是铁
obtain_neodymium_disc.desc: 不过至少能被磁铁吸住
obtain_neodymium_disc.title._explanation: Yet another reference to the vanilla Isn't It Iron Pick advancement.

obtain_ultrapure_diamond.title: 漫漫长路
obtain_ultrapure_diamond.title._explanation: Not intentionally a reference to anything.
obtain_ultrapure_diamond.desc._explanation: Refers to IC2's Industrial Diamond processing tree.

obtain_diffractor.title: 眨眼之间
obtain_diffractor.desc: 构建一个光/声位移力场生成器
obtain_diffractor.title._explanation: Corruption of an English set phrase - in the blink of an eye.

avoid_vibration_with_diffractor.title: 放纵
avoid_vibration_with_diffractor.desc: 仿佛了无牵挂一般在幽匿感测体旁疾跑

obtain_ultrapure_diamond_hoe.title: 难以置信的奉献
obtain_ultrapure_diamond_hoe.title._explanation: Reference to the vanilla Serious Dedication advancement.

grow_antlers.title: 突出物
grow_antlers.desc: 喝下塑料，然后就能长出一对鹿角？

remove_antlers.title: 奇怪的人类感
remove_antlers.title._explanation: Reference to a Moe Shop x Jamie Paige song.

obtain_spatula.title: 太大了
obtain_spatula.title._explanation: Reference to 'My spoon is too big' from Rejected, which was an internet meme for a bit.
obtain_spatula.desc._explanation: Reference to Questionable Content, which is what the item itself is ultimately a reference to.

project_many_blocks_in_one_cast.title: 马里奥绘画
project_many_blocks_in_one_cast.desc: 在极短的时间内创造出极多方块
project_many_blocks_in_one_cast.title._explanation: Reference to the Mario Paint game.

project_over_dangerous_spectrum_fluid.title: 有害收容
project_over_dangerous_spectrum_fluid.desc: 使用投影器安全收容一种危险的魔法流体

void_fire.title: 攻火需用……呃
void_fire.desc: 只要没有树，就不会有森林火灾了
void_fire.title._explanation: Corruption of an English set phrase - fighting fire with fire.

void_a_lot.title: 反正本来也不要这座山
void_a_lot.desc: 从现实中移除超过100000个方块

weak_snare.title: 这个监狱？锁不住我！
weak_snare.title._explanation: Reference to Ultrakill, description is a reference to inscriptions on dangerous radiation sources.
weak_snare.desc._explanation: Reference to inscriptions on dangerous radiation sources.

obtain_index.title: 新版9×9
obtain_index.desc: 将可调储物筒转化成录物箱
obtain_index.title._explanation: Reference to YouTuber Direwolf20's tendency to build and promote 9x9 shelters.

obtain_pinch_glom.title: 完美和谐
obtain_pinch_glom.desc: 将漏斗转化成捏合集物器

witness_morphic_idle.title: 马里奥乖乖
witness_morphic_idle.desc: 我开发来摸摸马里奥的机器
witness_morphic_idle.title._explanation: Reference to a Holly Hollowtones Super Mario 64 stream.

emi.category.yttr.continuity_gifts.chance.tooltip: 获得其中特定一种物品的概率

void_cauldron.tip: §7清除投入其中的物品和点击放入的物品。
supercooled_neodymium.tip: §7纵向放置两个此类方块，可让穿戴磁性盔甲的玩家在其间飞行。

alias.emi.yttr._explanation: Most of these aliases have a goal of players looking up common terms or items from other mods being shown Yttr's equivalent.
alias.emi.yttr.laser._explanation: To make Lazor Emitters show up even when spelling 'laser' correctly.
alias.emi.yttr.lazer._explanation: To make Lazor Emitters show up even when spelling 'laser' nearly correctly.
alias.emi.yttr.portablehole._explanation: As in Thaumcraft's item and wand focus.
alias.emi.yttr.carpenter._explanation: As in the mod Carpenters' Blocks.
alias.emi.yttr.barrel._explanation: Alias for finding Ruined blocks by their original names. As in Factorization's block.
alias.emi.yttr.quarry._explanation: Alias for finding Ruined blocks by their original names. As in BuildCraft's block.
alias.emi.yttr.rengine._explanation: Alias for finding Ruined blocks by their original names. As in BuildCraft's block.
alias.emi.yttr.icentrifuge._explanation: Alias for finding Ruined blocks by their original names. As in GregTech's block.
alias.emi.yttr.relay._explanation: Alias for finding Ruined blocks by their original names. As in RedPower2's block.
alias.emi.yttr.arb._explanation: Alias for finding Ruined blocks by their original names. As in Forestry's block.
alias.emi.yttr.pipe._explanation: Alias for finding Ruined blocks by their original names. As in BuildCraft's block.
alias.emi.yttr.tube._explanation: Alias for finding Ruined blocks by their original names. As in RedPower2's block.
alias.emi.yttr.cokeoven._explanation: Alias for finding Ruined blocks by their original names. As in RailCraft's block.
alias.emi.yttr.blastfurnace._explanation: Alias for finding Ruined blocks by their original names. As in RailCraft's block.
alias.emi.yttr.vacuum._explanation: As in OpenBlocks' Vacuum Hopper and Thermal Expansion's Vacuumulator.
alias.emi.yttr.blackhole._explanation: As in multiple mods' Black Hole Chest.
alias.emi.yttr.zzazz._explanation: As in the Pokemon Generation 1 glitch. Common nickname for the Metastable Weapon.

emi.category.lib39-machination.piston_sm: 对生成的云雾使用玻璃瓶

msg.yttr.wireframe.illegal: 线框渲染只可在创造模式或观察者模式启用
msg.yttr.glom_error.already_glommed: 无法在此放置集物器：已受其他集物器管理
msg.yttr.glom_error.not_inventory: 无法在此放置集物器：{}不是容器
msg.yttr.glom_error.inventory_not_empty: 无法在此放置集物器：容器必须为空
msg.yttr.glom_error.not_glommable: 无法在此放置集物器：{}无“接受集物器”标签
msg.yttr.glom_error.double_chest: 无法在此放置集物器：大箱子不接受集物器
msg.yttr.glom_error.c2me: 无法在此放置集物器：已安装C²ME
msg.yttr.glom_error.break: §l破坏它会清空所有相连的容器。§e潜行以确认破坏，或者可以先破坏集物器以断开连接。

modmenu.descriptionTranslation.yttr_wrap: 为改善压缩而给Yttr Jar-in-Jar额外设计的封装器。不用太过在意。
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.yttr:
关于虚空的模组，讲述了过往的事物，亦令其于今日复新。

原版增强与内容模组的联动，也是对旧版模组的一封情书。

§a主要作者：§r
  - Una
  - Kat
  - Kryn

§b主要贡献者：§r
  - LemmaEOF（红信相关，1.18） (InfraRedstone, 1.18移植）
  - Falkreon（红信相关）
  - jaskarth（1.20移植，优化，世界生成相关）
  - unilock（1.20移植，信雅互联支持）
按文件记录的完整人员鸣谢名单参见CREDITS.md。

§d特别感谢：§r
  - DaFuqs
  - Azzyypaaras
  - Eloraam
  - BBoldt
  - Sisby folk
  - Aesen
  - Aureate
  - Emi

§e谨献给：§r
  - Amelia 'SynthRose'
  - Azzyypaaras
modmenu.summaryTranslation.yttr: 过往的事物，于今日复新。
modmenu.summaryTranslation.yttr._explana: Shortened version of the mod's description to fit within ModMenu's short description in the left panel.
